description: Ready to expand your litigation career? Our client has an exciting opportunity for a Litigation Legal Administrative Assistant! The ideal candidate has 3 or more years of litigation experience, (Product Liability preferred), extensive knowledge of e-filing in the state of California, is a detail-oriented team player who is able to make tight deadlines and is extremely organized. The office is on a hybrid schedule and requires 3 days in the office and allows for 2 days remote.
responsibilities: Drafts/writes routine reports and correspondences, Prepare and/or review correspondence, reports and legal documents, Interacting with clients, Managing attorney calendar(s), E-filing (state and federal)

qualifications.required: 3+ years of litigation experience, 3+ years of filing in State and Federal Court, Extensive work with tables of authorities, High School diploma, Attention to detail/organized

benefits: 401(k), Dental insurance, Vision insurance, Medical insurance
remoteWork: Hybrid (3 days in office, 2 days remote)
